questions.question: Tell me about your age and gender?
questions.expected_answer: user age and gender information

questions.question: Do you have any family members or significant others?
questions.expected_answer: Relevant Family Members/Significant Others: [Mentioned or Not Mentioned]

questions.question: What is your employment status?
questions.expected_answer: Employment Status: [User's Employment Status]

questions.question: Do you feel supported in your personal and professional life?
questions.expected_answer:
Feeling Supported in Personal & Professional Life:
Personal Life Support: [1-10]
Professional Life Support: [1-10]

questions.question: Who do you turn to for comfort and support?
questions.expected_answer: Emotional Support System: [Identified People/Systems, Likelihood of Seeking Support]

questions.question: How do you feel about yourself overall? Do you struggle with self esteem issues? Is there any aspect of yourself that you find really difficult to accept?
questions.expected_answer:
Self-Esteem: [1-10]
Specific Insecurities: [User's Response]

questions.question: How do you take care of your physical and emotional health?
questions.expected_answer: Physical & Emotional Health Care: [User's Specific Practices]

questions.question: How would you describe your sleep patterns and food habits?
questions.expected_answer:
Sleep Patterns & Food Habits:
Frequency of Meals: [User's Description]
Quality of Meals: [Healthy/Unhealthy]
Frequency of Eating Out: [User's Description]
Sleep Duration: [User's Average Sleep Hours]
Sleep Pattern: [Regular/Irregular]
Time of Sleep: [User's Sleep Schedule]

questions.question: What activities do you enjoy that help you relax or feel fulfilled?
questions.expected_answer: Relaxation & Fulfillment Activities: [Specific Activities, Frequency, Alone/Involving Others]

questions.question: Have you experienced any traumatic events or adverse experiences in your life (like abuse, accidents, loss of loved ones etc)?
questions.expected_answer:
Experienced Trauma: [Yes/No/Unclear]
If Yes: [Type, Timeframe, Severity]

questions.question: How have these experiences impacted you emotionally?
questions.expected_answer: Emotional Impact: [Specific Emotions, Duration/Frequency, Triggers, Functional Impact]

questions.question: What coping strategies do you currently use to manage stress or difficult emotions?
questions.expected_answer:
Coping Strategies: [Yes/No/Unclear]
If Yes: [Specific Strategies, When Used, Frequency]

questions.question: Have you ever been diagnosed with a mental health disorder? If so, what was the diagnosis?
questions.expected_answer:
Diagnosed Mental Health Disorder: [Yes/No/Unclear]
If Yes: [Specific Diagnosis]

questions.question: Do you have a family history of mental health issues?
questions.expected_answer:
Family History of Mental Health Issues: [Yes/No/Unclear]
If Yes: [Specific Conditions & Family Members]

questions.question: Do you use any substances such as alcohol, drugs etc? If so then how frequently and in what amount?
questions.expected_answer:
Substance Use: [Yes/No/Unclear]
If Yes: [Specific Substance, Frequency, Triggers, Functional Impact, Current Status]

questions.question: Do you struggle with addiction or compulsive behaviors (like gambling, porn etc)?
questions.expected_answer:
Struggle with Addiction/Compulsive Behaviors: [Yes/No/Unclear]
If Yes: [Specific Addiction, Frequency, Triggers, Functional Impact, Current Status]

questions.question: Do you have any significant medical conditions?
questions.expected_answer:
Significant Medical Conditions: [Yes/No/Unclear]
If Yes: [Condition, Timeline, Daily Impact]

questions.question: Are you currently taking any medications? If so, what are they?
questions.expected_answer:
Current Medications: [Yes/No/Unclear]
If Yes: [Medication Names, Dosage, Frequency, Effectiveness]

questions.question: How has your mood been recently?
questions.expected_answer: Recent Mood: [User's Description]

questions.question: Do you feel difficulty in focusing and completing tasks / daily activities?
questions.expected_answer: Difficulty Focusing/Completing Tasks: [Yes/No]

questions.question: Have you had hallucinations recently / before?
questions.expected_answer: Hallucinations: [Yes/No/Unclear]

questions.question: What activities do you find yourself doing without realising? (Compulsive habits such as plucking of hairs, scarping off skin, biting nails).
questions.expected_answer:
Compulsive Habits: [Yes/No]
If Yes: [Specific Habit & Frequency]
